Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor cleared the bases with a grand slam in the bottom of the sixth inning, giving the Mets a 4-1 lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Phillies fans expressed heartbreak and disappointment after the loss, with some considering drastic measures to cope with the defeat.
Fans evacuated from Hurricane Milton only to witness the Phillies' loss in Philadelphia.
A pair of fans expressed their frustration and disappointment, stating they were 'fed up' with the loss.
